pages.text: Alchemical mechanisms are used in complex devices and equipment. An alchemical mechanism refers to parts or cores with specific functions.

pages.title: Alchemical Aspect Collector
pages.text: Collects Alchemical Aspects existing in the surroundings.$(br)The collected Aspects are mainly used as power sources in equipment and similar devices.$(br2)Using Arcane Refractors and Mana Collectors further enhances efficiency. Devices supporting multiple Alchemical Aspects are often possessed by spellcasters as power sources for their wands.
